price: دا د (ټولو) خلكو لپاره د پوهې درسونه دي او څوك چې يقين كوي د هغو لپاره هدايت او رحمت دى.
arabic: هَٰذَا بَصَٰٓئِرُ لِلنَّاسِ وَهُدٗى وَرَحۡمَةٞ لِّقَوۡمٖ يُوقِنُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: hādhā baṣāiru lilnnāsi wahudan waraḥmatun liqawmin yūqinūna
